summary: Provides a performance benchmark for the GS‑DDMM (generalized sampled dense‑dense matrix multiplication) kernel that computes the dot product of vectors u and v on graph data, using DGL and PyTorch to measure execution time and calculate GFLOPs.
business_intent: Enables developers and researchers to assess and compare the efficiency of the GS‑DDMM u·v kernel in graph‑based machine‑learning pipelines, supporting optimization and hardware selection decisions.
